content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI executed a shell command to search for information on rocks from Britannica and redirected the output to a file named "output.txt". A subprocess was started with PID 1198. I then read the contents of "output.txt" and wrote the information to a new file named "rock_meaning.txt". The latest development shows that the file was written to successfully.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""

Please refer to the 'COMMANDS' list for available commands and only respond in the specified JSON format."}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.darkstarnetwork.net/my_river_poem-txt/", "question": "What is the poem published on the website?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The poem published on the website is titled "my_river_poem.txt" and describes the river as a never-ending journey that carries life and is a symbol of strength and grace. \n \n Links: [\'\\n\\n (https://www.darkstarnetwork.net/)\', \'Home (https://www.darkstarnetwork.net/)\', \'Account (https://www.darkstarnetwork.net/account/)\', \'Login (https://www.darkstarnetwork.net/login/)\', \'Logout (https://www.darkstarnetwork.net/logout/)\']'}]
